state.response: ایچ آئی وی انفیکشن سے بچاؤ کے لیے محفوظ اور مؤثر ویکسین کی تیاری، ایچ آئی وی تحقیق کی اعلیٰ ترین ترجیحات میں سے ایک ہے۔

تیاری محفوظ اور مؤثر ویکسین ایچ آئی وی ت: HIV vaccine research priorities Is HIV vaccine safe and effective

Reduce the Incidence of HIV, including supporting the development of safe and effective vaccines, microbicides and pre-exposure prophylaxis. Develop Next-Generation HIV Therapies with improved safety and ease of use. Conduct Research Toward HIV Cure.
HIV vaccine research priorities Is HIV vaccine safe and effective

No. There is currently no vaccine available that will prevent HIV infection. However, scientists around the world, with support from the National Institutes of Health (NIH), are working to develop one.
